com.badlogic.gdx.backends.headless

Class HeadlessMini2DxGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.headless.HeadlessMini2DxGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Application

    public class HeadlessMini2DxGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Application
    Launches headless mini2Dx games. Based on LibGDX's LwjglApplication class The executeGame loop follows mini2Dx sequence: update, interpolate, render and tries to stay close to targetFps

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.badlogic.gdx.Application
